input_args.full_request:
"Write a short essay given this outline:
• Struggling with reading and writing in the early years
• Parents' encouragement and help
• The growing appreciation for the power of language
In my early years, I struggled with reading and writing. My parents, both avid readers, encouraged me to practice and helped me improve. As I grew older, I began to appreciate the power of language and its ability to communicate ideas, evoke emotions, and shape the world around us."
